findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.
findings.name: use-ownable2step

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.
findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix

findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.
findings.name: use-short-revert-string
